data.text:
RT @theoztrucker: I was on a plane yesterday. 

Mask all the way and social distance through the terminal.

Sit side by side on a packed pl…

@SoundWellMusic Me too! Definitely the most anxious I have been on a plane and had nothing to do with flight. I didn’t eat all day so I wouldn’t take off my mask and had a shower & at-home Covid test the moment I got here. Good to go!

https://t.co/IvMfSVEDoV

20 years later and people still dutifully take off their shoes and stuff things in 1-quart baggies. (Unless you have TSA or GE.)

But wearing a mask on a crowded plane is too much for a vocal and disruptive minority.

I remember when we could see people
@CristinaDragani Can’t imagine getting on a plane right now but if I did I’d wear an FFP3 mask

RT @theoztrucker: I was on a plane yesterday. 

Mask all the way and social distance through the terminal.

Sit side by side on a packed pl…

Waiting for weather to clear up.

Dude next to me on the plane took his mask off to talk on the phone. What are you doing bro???
RT @russbengtson: you'll take off your shoes at the airport for the rest of your life because one guy tried to blow up a plane with a bomb…

@Drift0r @JWoDesigns @ITSBLASPHVMY When I flew this last week we had to wear medical masks only on the plane but any type of mask was allowed in Heathrow airport ( Dubai airport was strictly medical masks only)

When you’re listening to the new @Mastiffhchc on a plane & it disconnects from the headphones …  I’ve just shared the joyous violence with the whole plane. Good thing the mask hides the face I was making #metal #metalheadatwork https://t.co/BpGu54Daqt
RT @NECN: The passenger wasn't following seatbelt and mask rules as the plane descended and had an argument with the flight attendant, beco…

RT @1a: "If people are traveling, continue to take precautions. Wear a mask to the airport and on a plane and when you get to your destinat…

Like I just boarded my plane and watched 20 white people get scanned through while 7+ minorities have to present their passport for manual checks and take off their mask for visual ID

On my turn, I get flagged as unable to board until the same

Because "The system" said so.

Record Air Travel in America this Labor Day. A vacation to die for, or is it a vacation to die from? Oct will tell. Enjoy Mexico by spending hours in a crowded airport followed by getting on a plane where people go batshit crazy and refuse to obey federal law and wear their mask.
